parameters.name: ClientId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud Backup client.

parameters.name: ClientType
parameters.description: The type of the Cloud Backup client. Valid value: **ECS_AGENT**, which indicates an SAP HANA backup client.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the SAP HANA instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 99. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The type of the data source. Valid value:**HANA**, which indicates SAP HANA backup.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault.
